Data: [{"Product_Description":"The first full laptop has arrived in the Surface family. Surface Book is a powerful laptop with a full sized,backlit keyboard for fast and natural typing.","Product_Title":"Powerful laptop","Product_image[image]":"https://az787822.vo.msecnd.net/sampleapps/productshowcase/powerful_laptop.jpg","__PowerAppsId__":"7haIPRI7o90"},{"Product_Description":"The 13.5\u201D PixelSense\u2122 display detaches easily from the keyboard to become a thin, light tablet that works perfectly with OneNote and Surface Pen.","Product_Title":"Portable clipboard","Product_image[image]":"https://az787822.vo.msecnd.net/sampleapps/productshowcase/portable_clipboard.jpg","__PowerAppsId__":"nk4FXHohDcU"},{"Product_Description":"Turn the screen around and reattach it to use Surface Book like a creative canvas.By reconnecting it to the keyboard, you unlock its full creative power in a pen first mode.","Product_Title":"Creative canvas","Product_image[image]":"https://az787822.vo.msecnd.net/sampleapps/productshowcase/creative_canvas.jpg","__PowerAppsId__":"_787mEh1ky8"},{"Product_Description":"Surface Book is built to be a creative workhorse. Combining a 6th Gen Intel\u00AE Core\u2122 i5 or i7 processor with up to 16GB1 of memory and an optional discrete graphics chip.","Product_Title":"Ultimate performance","Product_image[image]":"https://az787822.vo.msecnd.net/sampleapps/productshowcase/ultimate_performance.jpg","__PowerAppsId__":"UZxigNEhs5E"},{"Product_Description":"Use the multi-touch PixelSense\u2122 screen and Surface Pen to create with all the desktop software you already use, like Adobe\u00AE Photoshop\u00AE and Illustrator.","Product_Title":"Serious creativity","Product_image[image]":"https://az787822.vo.msecnd.net/sampleapps/productshowcase/serious_creativity.jpg","__PowerAppsId__":"7HMpoEKJozE"},{"Product_Description":"Write directly on webpages with Surface Pen in the all-new Microsoft Edge browser and share your notes easily.","Product_Title":"Markup webpages","Product_image[image]":"https://az787822.vo.msecnd.net/sampleapps/productshowcase/markup_webpages.jpg","__PowerAppsId__":"VEv9ngKX9oE"}]
Name: Product
